thread.title: Dutch arrest four men on suspicion of planning attack on Turkish consulate

title: Dutch arrest four men on suspicion of planning attack on Turkish consulate
text:
April 16, 2018 / 1:03 PM / Updated an hour ago Dutch arrest four men on suspicion of planning attack on Turkish consulate Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
AMSTERDAM (Reuters) - Dutch prosecutors said on Monday they had arrested four men suspected of planning an attack on the Turkish consulate in Rotterdam. 
In a statement, the national prosecutorâ€™s office identified the four as Moroccan-Dutch, and evidence of their plot had surfaced from a wiretap of a different man arrested in 2017. 
Three of the men are to be brought before a judge this week, while the fourth was arrested in Belgium and will be extradited, prosecutors said. Reporting by Toby Sterling; Editing by Alison Williams
